title: Construction of Zn–Cu bimetallic metal–organic frameworks for carbon dioxide capture
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20780-20785
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03539A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xinyu Li, Shijie Li, Jiahao Liu, Jin Zhang, Yunpeng Ren, Jianguo Zhao
This work demonstrated the hydrothermal synthesis of bimetallic MOF(Zn/Cu-BTC) for CO2 adsorption with high CO2/N2 adsorption selectivity.
